hero.title: Optimize Your
hero.description: Take control of your inventory with our powerful and intuitive software. Track stock levels, manage suppliers, and generate automated reports to optimize your business operations.

features.title: Powerful Features for Modern Businesses
features.subtitle: Everything you need to efficiently manage your inventory and grow your business operations.

realTimeTracking.title: Real-Time Stock Tracking
realTimeTracking.description: Monitor inventory levels in real-time with automated alerts for low stock and reorder points.

supplierManagement.title: Supplier Management
supplierManagement.description: Manage supplier relationships, track purchase orders, and maintain vendor performance metrics.

automatedReports.title: Automated Reports
automatedReports.description: Generate comprehensive reports on stock turnover, costs, and performance analytics.

quickIntegration.title: Quick Integration
quickIntegration.description: Easily integrate with your existing ERP, accounting, and e-commerce platforms.

secureCompliant.title: Secure and Compliant
secureCompliant.description: Enterprise-grade security with role-based access control and audit trails.

multiLocation.title: Multi-Location Support
multiLocation.description: Manage inventory across multiple warehouses and locations from a single dashboard.

pricing.title: Simple and Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your business. All plans include our core inventory management features.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small businesses getting started

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large organizations with complex needs

pricing.trialInfo: All plans include a 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Ready to transform your inventory management? Contact our team for a personalized demonstration.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll respond within 24 hours.
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your inventory management needs...

info.title: Contact Information
info.description: Reach us through any of these channels.

demo.title: Schedule a Demo
demo.description: See our inventory management system in action.
demo.details: Book a personalized 30-minute demo with our product experts and discover how our solution can optimize your inventory operations.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.subtitle: Be part of a dynamic team that's revolutionizing inventory management. Explore exciting career opportunities and grow with us.
careers.notFound: Don't see a position that fits? We're always looking for talented individuals.

details.applyDescription: Join our team and help shape the future of inventory management.

softwareEngineer.title: Senior Software Engineer
softwareEngineer.description: Join our engineering team to build scalable inventory management solutions using modern technologies.
responsibilities: Design and develop new features for our inventory management platform
Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code
Collaborate with product managers and designers to deliver exceptional user experiences
Mentor junior engineers and contribute to technical documentation
Participate in code reviews and architectural discussions
requirements: 5+ years of experience in software development
Strong proficiency in React, TypeScript, and Node.js
Experience with modern web technologies and cloud platforms
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

productManager.title: Product Manager
productManager.description: Lead product strategy and development for our inventory management platform, working closely with customers and stakeholders.
responsibilities: Define product vision and roadmap based on market research and customer feedback
Work with engineering teams to prioritize features and deliver value
Conduct user research and analyze product metrics
Collaborate with sales and marketing teams on go-to-market strategies
Present product updates to stakeholders and customers
requirements: 3-5 years of product management experience in B2B SaaS
Strong analytical and data-driven decision-making skills
Excellent communication and stakeholder management abilities
Experience with inventory or supply chain management is a plus
MBA or relevant advanced degree preferred

salesRepresentative.title: Sales Representative
salesRepresentative.description: Drive revenue growth by identifying and closing new business opportunities with small to medium-sized businesses.
responsibilities: Identify and qualify new sales opportunities through outbound prospecting
Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to potential customers
Build and maintain strong relationships with clients
Negotiate contracts and close deals to meet sales targets
Collaborate with marketing and customer success teams
requirements: 2-4 years of B2B sales experience, preferably in SaaS
Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales quotas
Experience with CRM tools (Salesforce, HubSpot, etc.)

application.title: Apply for this Position
application.description: Fill out the form below to submit your application. We'll review it and get back to you soon.

lowStockAlerts.title: Real-Time Low Stock Alerts
lowStockAlerts.subtitle: Never run out of stock again. Get automatic alerts when your products reach critical levels and reorder on time.
lowStockAlerts.itemsDescription: Monitor and manage your stock levels in real-time
lowStockAlerts.ctaText: Automate your stock alerts and never miss important products again

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of your inventory and activity
